aboutPage.name: Fakhri Ramdani
aboutPage.about: Experienced Software Engineer with 4 years  proficiency in Go, Java, PHP, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Git, and Docker. Skilled in designing scalable solutions, including contributions to a mission-critical backend system in Go and collaborating on Java-based microservices. Demonstrated expertise in optimizing PHP codebase, coupled with strong skills in efficient database design.

experiencePage.description: Developed and maintained Digital Banking application and content media display application for all syariah branches banking.#Developed and deployed the application using java (spring boot), oracle database, and git for digital banking and  go, postgreSQL, git, and docker for content media display application.#Collaborate with frontend team and quality assurance to ensure an integrated, secure, and high‑quality code.

Developed and maintained ERP Web Application for a large scale automotive company.#Developed ERP web application using PHP (CakePHP framework), javascript, html, css, and mysql.#Translated business requirements and other design specifcations into high quality production‑ready code. #Collaborate with user, product owner, and tester to ensure a high quality production‑ready code.
